mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.resource_id, d.user_id, d.content, d.page, d.send_time, d.likes, r.id rid, r.discussion_id rdiscussion_id, r.user_id ruser_id, r.content rcontent, r.username rusername, r.send_time rsend_time, r.likes rlikes, u.username uun FROM course_discussion d LEFT JOIN course_discussion_reply r ON r.discussion_id = d.id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = d.user_id WHERE d.resource_id = #{resourceId}

SELECT d.id, d.resource_id, d.user_id, d.content, d.page, d.send_time, d.likes, r.id rid, r.discussion_id rdiscussion_id, r.user_id ruser_id, r.content rcontent, r.username rusername, r.send_time rsend_time, r.likes rlikes, u.username uun FROM course_discussion d LEFT JOIN course_discussion_reply r ON r.discussion_id = d.id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = d.user_id WHERE d.resource_id = #{resourceId} AND d.page = #{page}
